title: ISic020459. ISic020459
body:
Facsimile Images

(scil. ἱερόν) ἐνθάφιον

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2) with slight changes

English translation

Offering to the dead.

Italian translation

Offerta funeraria.

commentary

The inscription states explicitly that the vase is a funerary offering. See, for the double aspiration, Kretschmer 1969, 149ff. For the use of the term ἐντάφιον in epigraphy see, e.g. IGCyr016700.

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Kretschmer 1969 149ff. https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002507
  • https://igcyr.unibo.it/igcyr016700 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002501
